cook:
(:action cook
    :parameters (?npc - player ?meat - item ?onion - item ?pan - item ?stove - item)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?stove) (at ?meat ?stove) (at ?onion ?stove) (is_pan ?pan) (is_stove ?stove) (is_raw_meat ?meat) (is_raw_vegetable ?onion))
    :effect (and (is_cooked ?meat) (is_cooked ?onion) (dirty ?pan))
)
```

2. **Action: drink_water**
```pddl
add:
(:action add_ingredients_to_sauce
    :parameters (?npc - player ?oil - item ?stove - item ?pot - item)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?stove) (at ?oil ?stove) (at ?pot ?stove) (is_oil ?oil) (is_pot ?pot) (is_stove ?stove) (clean ?pot) (hot ?stove))
    :effect (and (ingredient_in_pot ?oil ?pot) (dirty ?pot) (hot ?pot))
)
```

4. **Action: finish_wreath**
```pddl
finish:
(:action finish_wreath
    :parameters (?npc - player ?wreath - item)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?wreath) (in_progress ?wreath))
    :effect (and (completed ?wreath))
)
```

- **Pot:** 
  - **Attributes:** cleanness (clean -> dirty), location (in the cupboard | in the cabinet -> on the stovetop | on the stove top), temperature (cool -> hot)
- **Wreath:** 
  - **Attributes:** status (in progress -> completed)
- **Faucet:** 
  - **Attributes:** power (off -> on)
- **Water:** 
  - **Attributes:** temperature (cold -> hot), fullness (emptier -> fuller), location (in pipes -> out of faucet)
- **Canola oil:** 
  - **Attributes:** location (in drawer | in cupboard | on table -> on bottle | in bottle | over mouth of bottle), cleanness (clean -> dirty), wetness (dry -> wet)
- **Stove:** 
  - **Attributes:** temperature (cool | cold -> hot), power (off -> on), electric conductivity (turned off -> turned on), orientation (in the off position -> in the on position), temperature (medium-low -> low)
- **NPC:** 
  - **Attributes:** helmet decoration (bare | plain -> camouflaged), visibility (visible -> invisible)
